function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation drivers within the COVID-19 context","Impact":"Can lead to increased anxiety and functional impairment","Mitigation":"Education campaigns, fact-checking initiatives, and targeted messaging","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, social media monitoring algorithms","People":"General public, particularly those accessing online information about COVID-19","Owner":"Health authorities, social media platforms, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Cyberchondria","Impact":"Excessive worrying about being seriously ill leading to impairment and increased anxiety","Mitigation":"Cognitive-behavioral therapy, limiting online health searches, promoting healthy internet use","Technologies":"Online mental health platforms, internet usage monitoring tools","People":"Individuals engaging in excessive online health searches","Owner":"Mental health professionals, internet service providers"}]}
